title: Question:
author: shinsangmin
content: On March 9th at 2PM KST (5AM UTC), GalleryCoin(GLR) issued by CANVASN GALLERY PTE. LTD. successfully listed on LBank, one of the top 10 global cryptocurrency exchanges in the worldThanks to the market’s popularity, GalleryCoin(GLR) showed a price increase of nearly 40% on the day of listing, along with a subsequemt increase in trading volume, marking a successful launch.GalleryCoin(GLR) us a utility token that can be used on Canvas N platform.It is an Ethereum-based token, and a total of 2 billion tokens have been issued. Canvas N is preparing to open an offline gallery in Gangnam in April, and the token is expected to be widely used in carious services provided by the company as it expands its business. Due to its high utility, the token is already receiving attention from those interested in art investment. Canvas N, which aims to build a domestic and international art ecosystem, has expressed its ambition to lead a new paradigm in the industry.In preparation for the official service launch and to build a strong platform, Canvas N is actively recruiting new artists. They plan to activate the platform by utilizing marketing strategies such as paying a portion of GalleryCoin(GLR) as a reward to supported artists and galleries, and continually adding various use cases to increase demand for the token.CANVASN GALLERY PTE. LTD. official said, listing on a global major exchange was necessary for the successful expansion of the Canvas N ecosystem, and that they will continue to pursue global marketing and listings on domestic and international exchanges to lead recent art market trends such as metaverse and NFT.”Meanwhile, LBank, where GalleryCoin(GLR) was listed, is a large exchange ranked among the top 15 global exchanges according to CoinMarketCap and is used by over 6 million people in over 200 countries worldwide.▶GalleryCoin site: http://www.canvasn.io/▶Canvas N platform: https://www.canvasn.co.kr/▶Discord: https://discord.gg/milkomeda-n▶Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@canvasn▶Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/canvasn_official/▶Twitter: https://twitter.com/CanvasNofficialSource: http://www.jeonmin.co.kr/news/articleView.html?idxno=374431
